question:
Which among the following was / were the fallouts / results of the Feudalism in medieval India?
  1. Creation of smaller nuclei of Power
  2. Creation of secure and sacrosanct political pockets
  3. Improvement in the position of Shudras to some extent
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In the post-Gupta period, it is assumed that the position of ‘Shudras’ in the society had come up to the status of peasants from their earlier position of servants and domestic slaves.Huen-Tsang, in his accounts characterises ’Shudras’ as agriculturists.
